page.title: 08Winteringham Farm Pony Care
page.content: The saddle they use mostly is the general purpose one.The general purpose saddle is for the every day use.They use{Numners}which are a type of saddle blanket in the shape of a saddle.They stop the back of the horse getting sore from the saddle.If you haven't got a{numner}you should have a blanket.They also use the jumping saddle.The jumping saddle is a saddle with a deep seat.This saddle is designed to keep the rider in a forward position for jumping.One horse has a{kimblewick}bit because it is frisky.The{kimblewick}bit is strong on the mouth.The rest have snaffle bits because these are soft on the mouth.They have three feeds a day.They feed on pony nuts,flake maze,broad bran,oats and vitamin oats.Oats make the pony or horse silly.
